Good Comments: There was something wrong with the audio in episode 1, but otherwise good quality.
Bad Comments: constant grammar and spelling problems, overall it was good, but sometimes i felt like i was watching a hong kong sub job.

Good Comments: Some minor grammatical mistakes, but it makes sense. Typesetting is good. Picture quality a bit low, but probably due to raw.
Video quality is really low. But translation is perfect.
Bad Comments: Besides being the only fansub who is doing it, they make a nice work. I've seen their releases of Okusama wa Mahou Shoujo and they were pretty good. Upon watching their releases of Kujira, I must say I'm satisfied ;)
